attributes.action: TO abolish the TV Licence Fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The TV Licence fee is an out of date system which costs vast amounts of money and technology to police only resulting in poor programme quality and repeats on BBC.
It is time the licence was abolished and the BBC where forced to earn there money the same as everyone else.
By working for it instead of it being handed to them on a plate.
They already bend the advertising rules to the limit on a daily basis.
From Chris Moyles on radio one discussing Xbox360 on a regular basis to there so called soap Eastenders with constant product advertisement.
Why should the poor struggling working classes continue to pay and support the overpaid executives at the BBC.
